snippet: Capsys has made thousands of apartments and homes through modular construction from its factory at the Brooklyn Navy Yard, but its lease is running out.
abstract: Appraisal column; Capsys, Brooklyn-based company that constructs modular three-story rowhouses in a factory in Brooklyn Navy Yard, is in danger of losing its own home when its lease is up in two years; soaring rents and construction costs may force company, which has been located in same building for 18 years, to relocate outside New York City.
lead_paragraph: Capsys has made thousands of apartments and homes through modular construction from its factory at the Brooklyn Navy Yard, but its lease is running out.

headline.main: A Factory in Brooklyn That Constructs Homes Is Losing Its Own
headline.print_headline: A Factory in Brooklyn That Constructs Homes Is Losing Its Own
